function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential widespread illness and strain on healthcare resources","Mitigation":"Implementing intervention measures and reducing human-to-human contact","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and remote healthcare services","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of intervention measures","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Introduction of intervention strategies and protocols, timely response to outbreaks","Technologies":"Vaccination campaigns, quarantine facilities, public health surveillance systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient data for epidemic modeling","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of disease spread and potential delays in response","Mitigation":"Improving data collection and accuracy, utilizing advanced modeling techniques","Technologies":"Big data analytics, machine learning algorithms, epidemiological surveillance tools","People":"Epidemiologists, researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
